title: “HateDaddy, why aren’t you a mod anymore? What happened?”
body:
I was never offered a spot to be a mod, and I never would have accepted it had it been offered to me. I actually think, aside from very obvious forms of racism, sexism, abuse, and the worst of the worst, forum board should remain mostly unmoderated. 

I am not actually here to bash mods either: they’re often tasked to do the impossible. But years of watching them botch moderation on gameplay was all I needed to see. Them fools don’t get paid, and even if they did no salary would be worth the trouble. 

Although no lies, I laughed my ass off when TheCurator got bodied
